Key Match Events: Jose Iglesias drove in Tyrone Taylor with a base hit in the ninth inning, leading the New York Mets to a 3-2 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Pete Alonso homered to center (439 feet) in the 2nd inning.
Randall Grichuk homered to right center (387 feet), Perdomo scored in the 3rd inning.
Francisco Lindor homered to right (396 feet) in the 6th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Umpires: Home Plate Umpire - Bill Miller, First Base Umpire - Malachi Moore, Second Base Umpire - Emil Jimenez, Third Base Umpire - David Arrieta
